text: Au revoir les enfants (, meaning "Goodbye, Children") is a 1987 French Italian German autobiographical drama movie directed by Louis Malle and starring Gaspard Manesse, Raphaël Fejtö, Philippe Morier-Genoud, Francine Racette, Irène Jacob, Peter Fitz. It was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1988. ==Other websites== * * Category:1987 drama movies Category:1980s biographical movies Category:1987 war movies Category:French drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Louis Malle
title: Au revoir les enfants
